name: POGO KIDS!
description:
Movement: ASD / ←↓→ / Analog stick

POGO KIDS! is a competitive game about 2 kids having a jumping war on pogo sticks one afternoon in 1922.

It's a project in deep learning AI programmed and designed by Omer Zadok, for which I had the opportunity to apply my creative vision as an artist, animator and UI designer. All AI in the game learned how to play from real human players.

Omer Zadok: programming, and game design and AI

Idan Rooze: Art, Animations and UI
